title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
- Only with battery dosnot power PPBUS - 11.50V
-Only with AC adapter it power and works. PPBUS - 12.30 (too low? Bad SMC?)
- WIth ac adapter and battery it power and works. PPBUS - 12.30

If I remove battery it works 10 seconds more and shutdown. Already tried a new battery.
ISL 17,18 and 27,18 are 3ohm and 20ohm

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message: PP3V42 pressent with only battery???

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message: 12.3 means the data bus for battery has an issue.  Disconnect the battery indicator and try again. Else it may be a bad ISL or SMC.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
You mean this? [URL]http://www.thebookyard.com/images/mbpu13batind.jpg[/URL]

PP3V42 I dont know. Tomorrow will check.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message: Yes and 3V42 will be fine, it is a battery data bus issue. Disconnect BIL and see if PPBUS is 12,56V without battery. If not it is probably dead ISL/SMC

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
I have only the board on the table and still 12.30V
Next step is to replace ISL6259 then

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
I replaced ISL6259 and now I have 12.26V
Next step is replace SMC?
Balls are 0.30mm?

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message: Replace SMC. 0.3 or 0.4 both works.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
I put the balls by hand and already replaced it and I still have 12.28V
So now what I did is new SMC and new ISL. What more could be?

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message: R5280/81 or corrosion in battery indicator connector, D6950. Board still powers on after the SMC?

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
Yes, board still power. My first smc replacment was ok ;)
When os x load appear a x inside the battery. When disconect the magsafe, board will work 10 seg more.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message: Either a bad SMC again or the parts I mentioned. I assume you tried a known good battery and have the BIL disconnected.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message: A known good battery?? I measure 12.28V without battery and this depend from board only, right? So battery is not the problem I underatand as ppbus is not the correct value.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
Well yes, but a bad battery can cause 12.3V too if connected, but without it is indeed a board issue. 
Again I mentioned in post #12 the things that can cause this.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 12737"]R5280/81 or corrosion in battery indicator connector, D6950. Board still powers on after the SMC?[/QUOTE]

R5281 was really bad. I didnot have 3.42V on other side. I replace it and now I have 3.42V at SCL and SDA. But still I have 12.28V at PPBUS.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
I checked and resoldered ISL again and now I have 12.59V at PPBUS and 3.25V at pin14 - ACOK

But now it will not power up. Magesafe is present. I dont know what happend.

SMC_LID - 3.40V

VREG3 and VREG5 at U7200 are present.

PP3V3_S5 - 3.3V present

Cannot see change in PM_PWRBTN_L when press powerbtn. 

SMC_ADAPTER_EN - 0.47V

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message: SMC_ADAPTER_EN - 0.47V is not right, I guess fucked SMC or bad soldering.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
After reflow I lost magsafe
After reball I have magsafe but SMC_ADAPTER_EN at 0V
Do you know of which signals SMC_ADAPTER_EN depend? Only 3.42V is required? This way I can check those signals before replace smc or put old one.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message: SMC is probably dead.

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
All macbook pro and air boards PPBUS goes 0.3V less when there is problems with SMBUS?
Ok, tomorrow will replace SMC

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message:
I replaced smc and now works. Thanks for help.
Can you affirm  if all macbook pro and air boards PPBUS goes 0.3V less when there is problems with SMBUS?

title: [SOLVED]820-2879 with battery doesnot work
message: Yes, 0.3V less when SMC is not running or battery data bus is fucked.
